casebody.data:
MILES et al. v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. January 20, 1903.) No. 1,163. In Error to the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Georgia. R. T. Dorsey and Edwin H. Frazer, for plaintiffs in error. E. A. Angier, U. S. Atty., and George L. Bell, Asst. U. S. Atty.

Before PARDEE, McCORMICK, and SHELBY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the circuit court is affirmed.
